.table mother
----
text/plain

.table father
----
text/plain

parents{child: C, mother: M, father: F} :-
  mother{child: C, mother: M} &
  father{child: C, father: F}.
----
text/plain

sibling{left: L, right: R} :-
  parents{child: L, mother: M, father: F} &
  parents{child: R, mother: M, father: F} &
  L != R.
----
text/plain

.rulegraph
----
application/graphviz
digraph G {
  "0" [color="black" label="0: parents: Join(C: father.child = mother.child) []" shape="box"];
  "1" [color="black" label="1: sibling: Join(F: parents.father = parents.father & M: parents.mother = parents.mother) []" shape="box"];
  "2" [color="black" label="2: L != R []" shape="box"];
  "mother" [color="black" label="mother" shape="box"];
  "father" [color="black" label="father" shape="box"];
  "parents" [color="black" label="parents: Subst(parents{child: C, father: F, mother: M}) []" shape="box"];
  "sibling" [color="black" label="sibling: Subst(sibling{left: L, right: R}) []" shape="box"];
  "0" -> "parents" [];
  "1" -> "2" [];
  "2" -> "sibling" [];
  "father" -> "0" [];
  "mother" -> "0" [];
  "parents" -> "1" [];
  "parents" -> "1" [];
}

mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
----
text/plain
mother: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {}]
0: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", M: "Mary"}]
1: []

father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}.
----
text/plain
father: [father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {}]
1: [parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Pete", M: "Mary"}]
parents: [parents{child: "Pete", father: F, mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", M: "Mary"}]
2: []
3: []

mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}.
----
text/plain
mother: [mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {}]
0: [mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", M: "Mary"}]
1: []

father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}.
----
text/plain
father: [father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {}]
1: [parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Carolyn", M: "Mary"}]
parents: [parents{child: "Carolyn", father: F, mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", M: "Mary"}]
2: []
3: []

mother{child: "Steve", mother: "Jill"}.
----
text/plain
mother: [mother{child: "Steve", mother: "Jill"}; {}]
0: [mother{child: "Steve", mother: "Jill"}; {C: "Steve", M: "Jill"}]
1: []

mother{child: C, mother: M}.
----
application/datalog
mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", M: "Mary"}.
mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", M: "Mary"}.
mother{child: "Steve", mother: "Jill"}; {C: "Steve", M: "Jill"}.

mother{child: C, mother: "Mary"}.
----
application/datalog
mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete"}.
mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn"}.

----
